page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are no industries in Bromborough.The area is mostly farming .There are some shops near our school and a railway station on the Rockferry line. We visited{Eastham Youth/Community { centre}and we found out that a varity of activities happen there.Some people go to{Learning Links}to learn to get a job.They learn different skills for example typing,computing and first aid.people also go to discos,youth groups and the toddler groups. We went to two farms to interview Mr Cooper and Mr Ford. Together they employ five people who help them on their farms. We found that the majority of people just live in Bromborough and work in places like Liverpool and Chester.
